title: Kabbage's Petralia on Licensing Fintech to Global Banks (Audio)
itunes:title: Kabbage's Petralia on Licensing Fintech to Global Banks (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Kathryn Petralia, Co-Founder of Kabbage, on how global banks like ING and Scotiabank are leveraging Kabbage’s data and technology platform to give small businesses access to capital.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
